title: The Bull Case for Vaalco Energy and Its African Assets
summary: Vaalco Energy (NYSE:EGY) is small cap, Houston, Texas-based producer of oil and gas. title: US Rig Count Falls Off a Cliff In Thanksgiving Week
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell sharply this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Wednesday ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday. The total rig count in the US fell by 10 to 544 this week, according to Baker Hughes, down 38 from …
